Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a convex base, straight body, restricted mouth and tapered lip. An incised horizontal line accentuates the location of the maximum diametre of the exterior surface, which also bears a geometrical pattern in white paint. The latter is located in the upper section of the body, just above the incision and is comprised of three series of three superimposed horizontal marks, spread out around the circumference of the vase.
